short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your WikiTree experience with WikiTree Browser Extension Extras: WikiTree BEE

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WikiTree BEE (Browser Extension Extras)...

Highlights:

- Wiki tables and new profiles from Ancestry, FamilySearch, and Find a Grave records (and others)
- Cemetery Category creation from Find a Grave
- Category creation from Wikipedia
+ Some more features
